practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Car Accidents|Slip and Fall|Wrongful Death|Dog Bites|Assault and Battery|Product Liability|Medical Malpractice
description:
Devoted to helping you make your life whole again following a preventable tragedy that has left you or a loved one seriously injured or worse, the dedicated legal professionals at Rosen Justice in Jenkintown, Pennsylvania, are fully prepared to do whatever we can to help you obtain the favorable outcomes you seek and the justice you deserve for the injuries and losses you suffered due to any of the following incidents and more:

  • Car, truck and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Dog bites and animal attacks
  • Medical malpractice
  • Products liability
  • Assault and battery injuries
  • Slip-and-fall accidents
  • SEPTA accidents
  • Wrongful death

Backed by our more than 75 combined years of legal experience, our law firm's attorneys possess the extensive skills and resources necessary to handle your claim efficiently. Since our inception, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients.

Recognized as among the leading trial advocates in the country, our lawyers have earned spots on The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 under 40 list as well as The National Trial Lawyers: Top 25 designations for mass torts. In addition, we have received many other accolades and endorsements from our peers as well as numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

As further evidence of our success, our law firm has an additional office in Philadelphia, so you are never far away from quality, professional legal counsel when you need it the most.

To find out more about how we can best serve your needs, you can contact Rosen Justice to receive a free evaluation of your claim. We also currently offer virtual consultations to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
